resources.string:
License:
The hosts file is from an Open Source Project of hosts on Github, I\'m Just a Porter of the Project.

Instructions:
Using this Application, you can explore on Google at China.(EX:Facebook, Twitter, etc.)
Ⅰ. The hosts file belongs to the system files, So you\'d better Root your device.
Ⅱ. After get Root Permission, then connect to the Internet and click the \"Update\" Button, you will get the last file.
Ⅲ. If you find you can\'t explore on Google one day, please click the \"Update\" Button again. And if you don\'t want to use it, please click the \"Restore\" Button to initialize.
